text: Alfredo Enrique Borrero Vega (born 19 October 1955) is an Ecuadorian neurosurgeon and politician. He was the 52nd vice president of Ecuador from 24 May 2021 until 23 November 2023. Borrero Vega was the running mate of Guillermo Lasso and they would win the 2021 election. He is a member of the Creating Opportunities. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Neurosurgeons Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador
title: Alfredo Borrero
